sentences.en: Although her illness is serious, her condition is beginning to stabilize.
sentences.cn: 虽然她病得很重，但病情正开始趋于稳定。

sentences.en: Attitudes to mental illness have shifted in recent years.
sentences.cn: 最近几年对精神病的态度已有所改变。

sentences.en: Career-wise, this illness couldn't have come at a worse time.
sentences.cn: 考虑到事业，这场病来得最不是时候。

sentences.en: Childhood illness can be upsetting for children and parents alike.
sentences.cn: 儿科病会让孩子和父母同样苦恼。

sentences.en: For years he tended her in her painful illness.
sentences.cn: 多年来她一直受到病痛的折磨，都是他在照料。

sentences.en: He boasts of dodging military service by feigning illness.
sentences.cn: 他炫耀自己通过装病来逃避服兵役。

sentences.en: Her mother was recovering from a serious illness.
sentences.cn: 她母亲重病后正在逐渐康复。

sentences.en: Hugo bore his illness with great courage and good humour.
sentences.cn: 雨果以巨大的勇气和良好的精神状态面对疾病。

sentences.en: I’ve never missed a day’s work through illness.
sentences.cn: 我从未因病耽误过一天工作。

sentences.en: In spite of his illness, he clung tenaciously to his job.
sentences.cn: 尽管有病在身，他仍顽强地坚持工作。

sentences.en: It is indisputable that birds in the UK are harbouring this illness.
sentences.cn: 无可争辩的是，英国的鸟类携带着这种疾病的病菌。

sentences.en: She had all the normal childhood illnesses.
sentences.cn: 儿童的常见病她小时候都得过。

sentences.en: She returned to her family home to recover from an illness.
She was determined not to let the illness take hold again.
sentences.cn: 她决心不让疾病再次击垮自己。

sentences.en: The gene is only part of the causation of illness.
sentences.cn: 基因只是致病的部分原因。

sentences.en: The illness had a profound effect on his outlook.
sentences.cn: 这场病对他的人生观产生了深刻的影响。

sentences.en: Their main job is to preserve health rather than treat illness.
sentences.cn: 它们的主要功效是保健而非治病。

sentences.en: ways to improve your health and reduce the risk of illness
sentences.cn: 增进健康减少疾病的方法

sentences.en: You can hedge against redundancy or illness with insurance.
sentences.cn: 可以购买保险以防失业或患病。

words.tran_cn: 生病的；坏的；邪恶的；不吉利的

trans.tran_cn: 疾病，某种具体疾病，不健康
trans.tran_en: a disease of the body or mind, or the condition of being ill
